typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		inss_identifier as string,
		organizationid as string,
		inss_debttypeid as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		inss_name as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(tsModifiedOn = toTimestamp(modifiedon),
		tsCreatedOn = toTimestamp(createdon),
		strINSSDebtTypeId = toString(inss_debttypeid),
		strINSSName = toString(inss_name)) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(strINSSDebtTypeId) || isNull(strINSSName) || isNull(tsModifiedOn) || isNull(tsCreatedOn ), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(tsModifiedOn = coalesce(tsModifiedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsCreatedOn = coalesce(tsCreatedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		strINSSDebtTypeId = coalesce(strINSSDebtTypeId, 'missing'),
		strINSSName = coalesce(strINSSName, 'missing')) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strINSSDebtTypeId) > 36 || length(strINSSName) > 500, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strINSSDebtTypeId = left(strINSSDebtTypeId, 36),
		strINSSName = left(strINSSName, 500)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
